input.sentences: [male] getting ready to fly through the racecourse .
[male] posing for a picture before the race .
a local television crew interviews [male] 's mother before the race .
the racers mingling about before the starting gun .
[male] finally getting a chance to speak to the camera .
output.sentences: It was marathon day, and the racecourse was open to the male population.
Many runners and volunteers helping with the event posed for pictures before the race began.
A mother watching the race even had her son interviewed to be on television.
At the starting line, the racers were mingling and wishing each other luck on the race.
Finally, the male event coordinator got up to speak, officially beginning the race.
